column4: hi since upgrading to lucid, my keyboard seems to get stuck on random key and repeats. in the end I have to reboot. have tried several keyboards since
Have you noticed any odd messages on boot?  Perhaps something about udev?

I have a few problems since upgrading to 10.04.  Most notably, sound no longer works, and I get some strange errors from udevd on boot.  Something about worker [220] did not accept signal -1 ... kill it
